CreateTrainingModel.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tione.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateTrainingModel
<公共请求参数>

{
    "TrainingJobName": "xx",
    "TrainingJobId": "xx",
    "TrainingModelVersion": "xx",
    "Tags": [
        {
            "TagKey": "xx",
            "TagValue": "xx"
        }
    ],
    "ModelMoveMode": "xx",
    "TrainingModelIndex": "xx",
    "ReasoningEnvironment": "xx",
    "TrainingModelName": "xx",
    "AlgorithmFramework": "xx",
    "ImportMethod": "xx",
    "ReasoningImageInfo": {
        "ImageUrl": "xx",
        "RegistryRegion": "xx",
        "RegistryId": "xx",
        "ImageType": "xx"
    },
    "ReasoningEnvironmentSource": "xx",
    "TrainingModelCosPath": {
        "Paths": [
            "xx"
        ],
        "Region": "xx",
        "Bucket": "xx"
    }
}
